Uses of Package
grails.plugin.multitenant.core

Packages that use grails.plugin.multitenant.core
grails.plugin.multitenant.core

Classes in grails.plugin.multitenant.core used by grails.plugin.multitenant.core
CurrentTenant
          Each tenant is identified by a number.
CurrentTenantAware
          Beans implementing this interface will get the 'currentTenant' bean injected.
Tenant
          Most applications will have one domain class implementing this interface and the tenantId method will most likely return the database generated id to allow for fast lookups from second level cache.
TenantRepository
          Most applications will probably provide an implementation of this interface.
 

Classes in grails.plugin.multitenant.core used by grails.plugin.multitenant.core.impl
CurrentTenant
          Each tenant is identified by a number.
 

Classes in grails.plugin.multitenant.core used by grails.plugin.multitenant.core.servlet

          Each tenant is identified by a number.
 

Classes in grails.plugin.multitenant.core used by grails.plugin.multitenant.core.spring

          Each tenant is identified by a number.
 

Classes in grails.plugin.multitenant.core used by grails.plugin.multitenant.singledb.hibernate
CurrentTenant
          Each tenant is identified by a number.
MultiTenantDomainClass
          All multi tenant domain classes should implement this interface.
Tenant
          Most applications will have one domain class implementing this interface and the tenantId method will most likely return the database generated id to allow for fast lookups from second level cache.
